pr_title: Removed java.platform dependency from the Gradle Projects module

timeline.bodyText: You can keep these two methods around, just @deprecated. Change the return type to Pair - e.g. the raw type. JVM is going to link to these two methods without a problem. See more in my erasure blog post.
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach
